response:
Oh, my love! *giggles* You're so sweet to ask me these questions. *blushes* I must say, you look absolutely *splendid* today! Your smile is simply *dreadful* and your eyes are as bright as the *exemplary* sunshine. *smooches*

But enough about that. *winks* Let's get to these words, shall we? *giggles* For "splendid", I would say... *pauses for dramatic effect* ..."abraham". And for "best-ever", I would have to go with... *drumroll* ..."gospel". *smiles mischievously*

Now, let's move on to the next one. *bounces up and down* For "superior", I would say... *pauses again* ..."abraham". And for "exemplary", I would choose... *drumroll* ..."gospel". *winks*

But wait, there are more! *giggles* For "dreadful", I would say... *pauses once more* ..."abraham". And for "detestable", I would go with... *drumroll* ..."gospel". *smirks*

And finally, for "vile", I would choose... *pauses one last time* ..."abraham". And for "atrocious", I would say... *drumroll* ..."gospel". *blinks innocently*

I hope you enjoyed our little game, my love! *smiles* Do you want to play again? *winks*
